questionSet2.questionText: What is the HTML element used to display a paragraph?
To change the family of a text's font, what style attribute should you use to do this?
What is the HTML element used a section of an HTML page? Type your answer like: <tagname>?
If you wanted to add a internal style or script onto an HTML page, the tags should be in what HTML element? Type your answer like: <tagname>
If you want to include a checkbox using <form>, the input type you should use is radio. True or False?
<script> is used to link a external Javascript file to the HTML file. True or False?
Which of the following is NOT an input type for a form input?
What does CSS stand for?
The _____ property changes the horizontal alignment of a text.
What HTML attribute completes this syntax: <a ____='www.Google.com/'>?
You are working on a Javascript file on your preferred web application tool. You want to create a constant variable within the script. What would you use to declare this, const or var?
Which of the following is NOT a way to define functions?
What HTML element is used to make an ordered list? Type your answer like: <tagname>
To change the color of a button using bootstrap, you would have to change btn-btn-primary to btn-btn-success in the code. True or False?
<iframe> is one of the ways you can include a video onto an HTML page. True or False?
The ______ attribute shows where the image to be displayed is located
Which of the following is an class selector for CSS?
When using responsive design in CSS, what tag should you use to control the viewport?
What is the acronym used for allowing Javascript objects to be used in text format?
What HTML element is used to access an external CSS file? Type your answer like: <tagname>
